title: How to connect my Apple ear pods to my Samsung smart TV - Quora

response.answer_text: In Case of Sony Smart TVs - Sony TVs are **programmed to connect majorly to only sony Bluetooth devices.** but you can connect sony tv with any Bluetooth by following few steps. you need to download aptoide and Bluetooth pair app. You can check video  You can check the above method, I think it can help you to connect. Hit UpVote button if you like the solution.
Bluetooth pairing - turn it on on the Samsung, open the earpod case next to the TV and follow the onscreen instructions. Ear pods will pair with almost any bluetooth device.
